column3: School of Engineering, Computing and Mathematical Science
column5: The course will develop a depth of knowledge across several specialised and applied areas of Computer Science, such as Software Development, Mobile and Web Development, Advanced Databases, and Distributed Computing.These are areas that are much in demand, both in industry and research.There is a strong emphasis upon practical experience backed up with the underlying theory from the academics who are active and publishing researchers. The course focus is on teaching up-to-date and relevant in-demand knowledge and skills, from web development through to ethical hacking.
column7: Home - Full-time - £8395 per year Home - Part-time - £4198 per year International - Full-time - £15450 per year
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
